review: I went for my first pregnancy check ups actually we started to take the treatment from the middle of fifth month. But from the day one she took care very well. Each and every visit she used to explain everything in detail. She was so friendly and available over the call, all the time to clarify my pregnancy doubts. I got water leakage before one week of my due date. I was not aware it's a delivery symptoms. I called her, she advised me to get admitted in the hospital but we didn't . The water leakage started to increase. Evening we rushed to her clinic. She took a scan, almost half of the water came out. Then we admitted in the hospital. Since we already had personal experience with our relatives for the situation like this we were scared and thought it will be a c-section. But she was trying her level best for normal delivery. Even on late night also she took care of the delivery. It was a normal delivery, now me and my baby both of us are fine. She was so friendly all the time, the way she treats her patients is good even after the delivery. She never told the word C-Section throughout our check ups. It's really rare to see a doctor like this in this current world. The Clinic staffs and ambiances of the clinic also good. They never forced us to buy the medicines from their pharmacy. Overall it was a great and happy experience. Keep continuing the good and great work.
